mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.state, r.user_id, COALESCE(ooh.user_id, oops.user_id, c.user_id) AS target_id, COALESCE(ooh.content, oops.content, c.content) AS target_content FROM report r LEFT JOIN ooh_record ooh ON r.ooh_id IS NOT NULL AND r.ooh_id = ooh.id LEFT JOIN oops_record oops ON r.oops_id IS NOT NULL AND r.oops_id = oops.id LEFT JOIN comments c ON r.comment_id IS NOT NULL AND r.comment_id = c.id WHERE r.id = #{reportId}
